title: Japanese-style dressing

ingredients.content: 160 g carrot, cut into pieces (approx. 3 cm)
130 g green apple, cored and cut into quarters

preparations.content: Place all dressing ingredients, except sesame seeds, into mixing bowl and blend <b>1 min/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add sesame seeds and mix <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>. Drizzle over salad or transfer into a sealable container and place into refrigerator until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: This dressing is delicious when stirred through hot or cold noodles, drizzled over steamed vegetables or served with steamed or grilled fish.
Use it to replace the miso dressing in the Miso coleslaw (please refer to the recipe on this recipe chip).
You can store this dressing in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
